about_the_game:
This artbook showcases the concept art created for Heads Will Roll. The imagery consists of curated portraits of main and side characters, enemies and ingame scenes. Some scenes might be a spoiler.

Discover The digital release of this artbook with 50+ pages, featuring content from the original Heads Will Roll and Heads Will Roll: Reforged and how the visuals have changed since the original game.

Available in pdf

How to access:
The Artbook will be downloaded in the folder where the game is installed in your computer (tipically Program Files (X86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Heads Will Roll).
